channel.title: Signed client doesn't connect to my server
channel.description: ^ What could be wrong? I did change the ip on GUI.java and Client.java to my vps's ip...

item.title: Signed client doesn't connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:5, topic:541627”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=660499.msg4416294#msg4416294 date=1396061558]
Why not? Explain the harm in using the VPS’s IP address.
[/quote]

There is no harm but mostly likely you will face problems where it won’t allow people to connect. The best solution is what I stated above give it a try and see if it works![/quote]
Okay now you’re going to have to explain yourself yet again…
go to: http://facebook.com
No issues, right?
Now try:
http://31.13.66.160
Holy shit! It’s facebook. Now why is that? Why did going to the ip address work instead of going to the .com domain?

It’s the same logic with no-ip. I’m sorry but you’re not being logical here. As I told you before, the only realistic reason you would need no-ip is if you did not have a static ip address. 90% of VPS’s will.

Read full topic
item.source: Signed client doesn't connect to my server

item.title: Signed client doesn't connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Why not? Explain the harm in using the VPS’s IP address.

There is no harm but mostly likely you will face problems where it won’t allow people to connect. The best solution is what I stated above give it a try and see if it works!

Read full topic
item.source: Signed client doesn't connect to my server

item.title: Signed client doesn't connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @Cuber317 Cuber317
item.description:
@Cuber317 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:541627”][quote author=ultimatepkvillage link=topic=660499.msg4416292#msg4416292 date=1396061335]
:palm: Don’t use the vps ip simply download no-ip on the vps. And change the ip in Gui.java/Client.java then re-sign client
[/quote]
Why not? Explain the harm in using the VPS’s IP address.[/quote]
^ Thats exactly what i was thinking…
But anyone got idea what could be wrong?

Read full topic
